ygData.subject: Re: Reply to Shadow Wing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... OH no you don t! Your not going after that slag by yourself.  You may be a great warrior, but I ll not have you go run off into your own death like that.

::Shadow Wing::

"OH no you don't! Your not going after that slag by yourself.  You 
may be a great warrior, but I'll not have you go run off into your 
own death like that. Nopt without me you won't"
She was flustered at him now.  He told her to stay back, and now he 
wanted to just charge in there.  She wasn't about to let that 
happened and not be there to help him out.
"I"ll find Megatron if you promise to let me help fight him. Your not 
getting slagged withme, and that's final."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine calls Shadow Wing over his comm, "Wing, I need a favour, 
> get airborn and use your scanners to find Megatrons exaust trail. 
If 
> at all possible find a way to mark it."
> 
> Again he tries to push his point across to Ramhorn, "I can track 
that 
> mechan slime slug. He needs to be taught a lesson that we're not 
just 
> his toys." Thoughts go through the wolfs brain of what he'd like to 
> teach the tyrant."If I get my paws on him I'll teach him a lesson 
of 
> the permanent kind."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, TrikeJacob@n... wrote:
> > Triceradon: We're just fine Shadow Wing. Is there anything we 
need 
> to do?
